code: import axios from'axios';const EMPLOYEE_BASE_REST_API_URL='http://localhost:8080/feb9/employees';class EmployeeService{getAllEmployees(){return axios.get(EMPLOYEE_BASE_REST_API_URL);}createEmployee(employee){return axios.post(EMPLOYEE_BASE_REST_API_URL,employee);}getEmployeeById(employeeId){return axios.get(EMPLOYEE_BASE_REST_API_URL+'/'+employeeId);}updateEmployee(employeeId,employee){return axios.put(EMPLOYEE_BASE_REST_API_URL+'/'+employeeId,employee);}deleteEmployee(employeeId){return axios.delete(EMPLOYEE_BASE_REST_API_URL+'/'+employeeId);}}export default new EmployeeService();
